verses.roman:
so 'paviddho bhagavatā
punar utthāya satvaram
āpatat svinna-sarvāṅgo
niḥśvasan krodha-mūrcchitaḥ

synonyms: saḥ—he; apaviddhaḥ—thrown back; bhagavatā—by the Lord; punaḥ—again; utthāya—rising; satvaram—quickly; āpatat—attacked; svinna—sweating; sarva—all; aṅgaḥ—his limbs; niḥśvasan—breathing hard; krodha—by anger; mūrcchitaḥ—stupefied.
translation: Thus repulsed by the Supreme Lord, the bull demon got up and, breathing hard and sweating all over his body, again charged Him in a mindless rage.
